snippet: James B. Comey, the F.B.I. director, takes issue with an editorial.
abstract: Letter from James B Comey, Federal Bureau of Investigation director, comments on Nov 1 editorial on FBI's deceptive tactics.
lead_paragraph: James B. Comey, the F.B.I. director, takes issue with an editorial.

headline.main: To Catch a Crook: The F.B.I.’s Use of Deception
